data.title: Application for Admission to the Visiting Exchange Students Program
data.meta_description: Along with their completed applications, students applying to attend Stanford through the Foreign Law Exchange Program must submit the following mater
data.text:
Along with their completed applications, students applying to attend Stanford through the Foreign Law Exchange Program must submit the following materials:

Confirmation from their home law school that they have been nominated for the student exchange program;

A resume or curriculum vitae;

A personal statement of no more than two pages describing the student’s reasons for wishing to study at Stanford and any of the student’s important qualities that they would like us to know about;

A TOEFL score report; and

An official transcript from their home law school (include a certified English translation if applicable).

IMPORTANT: EXCEPT FOR THE OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT, versions must be submitted by the student with their online application form. Students must arrange to have official transcripts from their home law school emailed to the Office of Admissions or mailed to the following address:

Visiting Exchange Students Program

Office of Admissions

Stanford Law School

Crown Quadrangle

559 Nathan Abbott Way

Stanford, CA 94305-8610

The application deadline for incoming exchange students who wish to attend Stanford Law School during the 2024-2025 academic year is April 19, 2024. Students will be notified of their enrollment status in May 2024.
